task: Create responsive, accessible HTML sermon webpage with interactive UI

input.video_title: 03 August 2025 | Clickbait: Satan: The Father of Lies

content.speaker: Pastor Albert
content.main_bible_verses: Extract the primary scripture references used in the message.

workflow.step_2: Select theme (colors, fonts, tone) matching content
workflow.step_3: Generate standalone HTML with Tailwind CSS + custom styles
workflow.output: Single HTML file with integrated content and interactive features

archetypes.name: Swiss Minimalist
archetypes.traits: Large typography, grid-based, high contrast, minimal shadows, sans-serif

archetypes.name: Modern Organic
archetypes.traits: Soft border-radius, pastel palette, serif headings, paper textures, floating cards

archetypes.name: Digital Brutalist
archetypes.traits: Monospace fonts, neon accents, thick borders, sharp edges, high saturation

archetypes.name: Classic Theological
archetypes.traits: Traditional serif, gold/deep red/navy palette, centered layouts, divider ornaments

archetypes.name: Contextual Wildcard
archetypes.traits: Invent a unique style specifically matching the content's metaphor.

quotes.authors: Include all, cite sources, mark paraphrases

content_rules.structure: Chronological flow unless clarity requires restructuring

ui_components.selection_logic: Select 3-4 components that best fit the specific content density. Do not use all.
ui_components.tooltip_spec: Float independently at top-right (all devices) for term definitions
ui_components.default_state: Main content expanded, others collapsed unless beneficial
tabs: **Contextual Tab**: If the content has a unique structure (e.g., 'Historical Context', 'Greek Word Study', 'Prayer Points'), create a custom tab for it.

header.instruction: Please select options for each attribute below that best fit the content.
layout_options: **Experimental**: Create a layout that visually mimics the content title.

type: **Generative CSS**: Use CSS patterns or SVG filters to create a dynamic background representing the content theme.
animation: **Custom Keyframes**: Create a subtle animation specific to the mood.

content.full: Generated by LLM with supervision by benjaminficusmicrocarpa. MIT License

color_strategy_options: **Thematic Extraction**: Extract the two dominant colors mentioned or visualized in the content and build a custom palette.

pairing_options: **Mood Match**: Select a font pairing that contradicts the others if it fits the content tone.

styling.accessibility: WCAG AA compliant (keyboard nav, ARIA, focus management)

technical.format: Standalone HTML + Tailwind CSS + vanilla JS
technical.optimization: Fast load, minimal dependencies, lazy-load images, print-friendly
